rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0001
rows.name:
What's wrong, Hotaru?
You seem down...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0002
rows.name:
What's the matter, Hotaru?
You don't look very cheerful...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0003
rows.name:
What's the matter, Hotaru?
You appear to be low on spirits...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0004
rows.name:
What's the matter, Hotaru?
You're looking pretty glum...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0005
rows.name: ...The ground is covered in sand.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0006
rows.name:
Tell me, is this really
supposed to be Eden?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0007
rows.name:
No flowers, trees, or even grass.
Just a land of sand and rock...?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0009
rows.name:
Look over there.
That was probably a lake once

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0010
rows.name:
But now there's not
a single drop of water.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0011
rows.name: I guess it doesn't rain here.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0012
rows.name: I guess it doesn't rain here.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0013
rows.name:
I surmise it doesn't
rain in this location.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0014
rows.name: I bet it never rains round these parts.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0015
rows.name:
Water is essential
for all living things.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0016
rows.name: And there's no water here at all...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0017
rows.name:
Nothing can be born
in this kind of land...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0018
rows.name:
Even with poor soil there would
be some hope But this place...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0019
rows.name: This land is already dead...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0020
rows.name: Hotaru...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0021
rows.name:
Is there any way to bring
back the greenery?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0022
rows.name:
It's truly sad that
nature has disappeared.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0023
rows.name: Hotaru...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0024
rows.name:
Is there any way at all
to restore the greenery?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0025
rows.name: It's sad when nature disappears.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0026
rows.name: Hotaru...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0027
rows.name:
Can we find a way to
restore the greenery?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0028
rows.name: It's distressing when nature disappears.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0029
rows.name: Hotaru...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0030
rows.name:
Ain't there some way
to bring back the green?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0031
rows.name: It's mighty sad when nature goes away.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0101
rows.name:
Roots can't take hold in sand like this
And plants can't grow without water....

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0103
rows.name: ...Wait, maybe it is possible.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0105
rows.name:
You know, life is
incredibly resilient.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0106
rows.name:
Yes, nothing might sprout
naturally in this sandy soil but...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0107
rows.name:
...We could get some seedlings from
somewhere else and plant them here?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0108
rows.name:
Could we perhaps grow plants here
that were started somewhere else?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0109
rows.name:
It might be possible to grow plants here
that were raised elsewhere.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0110
rows.name:
Maybe we could grow plants here
that were started elsewhere.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0111
rows.name: Yes!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0112
rows.name:
They probably won't
survive long at first.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0113
rows.name:
But even when the plants die
they'll remain in the soil
as fertilizer...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0114
rows.name:
They'll provide nutrients for
the next generation of plants.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0115
rows.name:
It might take a very long time
but if we keep doing this...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0116
rows.name:
We might be able to bring
this dead land back to life!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0117
rows.name:
At last you seem to be back
to your old self, Hotaru.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0118
rows.name:
At last you're back
to your normal self, Hotaru.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0119
rows.name:
At last it appears you've
returned to your normal self, Hotaru.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0120
rows.name:
At last you're back
to being the Hotaru we know.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0121
rows.name: Yes! Thank you.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0122
rows.name: I'm going to try it.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0123
rows.name:
I'm definitely going to
bring green back to this land!

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0201
rows.name: That's so sad...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0202
rows.name:
When nature disappears life and
everything else disappears with it

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0203
rows.name:
Don't humans feel sad
when they see sights like this?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0204
rows.name:
Most living things come from nature
and should live in harmony with it...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0205
rows.name: Why don't they try to protect it?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0206
rows.name:
It's as valuable as their own lives
so how can they be so careless with it?

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0207
rows.name:
It's because it's so commonplace that
they don't recognize how precious it is.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0208
rows.name:
It's probably because it's
so commonplace that they fail
to recognize its importance.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0209
rows.name:
It is because it is so
taken for granted that they fail
to recognize its significance

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0210
rows.name:
It's 'cause it's so darn
normal that they don't
see how important it is

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0211
rows.name:
I wasn't born from nature
since I'm a Blade.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0212
rows.name:
That's why I envy humans so much
and can't stand those
who don't respect nature.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0213
rows.name: There are kind humans like you too...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0214
rows.name:
I still don't understand
most humans.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0215
rows.name: That's okay for now.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0216
rows.name:
No need to rush
Let's take our time
to understand each other.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0217
rows.name: Yeah, I think you're right.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0218
rows.name:
I believe someday we'll come
to understand each other.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0219
rows.name: There's no need to hurry.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0220
rows.name:
Let's take the time
to gradually understand one another.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0221
rows.name: That's fine for now, ain't it.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0222
rows.name:
Taking time to understand each other
is the way to go.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0223
rows.name: Yeah, you're right...

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0224
rows.name:
You understand me
really well, don't you.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0225
rows.name:
That's why I can stay positive
even when sad things happen.

rows.label: kizunatalk063_msg0226
rows.name:
Thank you!
Let's continue to work well together!
